front.title: IEEE Standard for VHDL Register Transfer Level (RTL) Synthesis

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: very highspeedintegrated circuit hardware description language (VHDL)
front.abstract: This document specifies a standard for use of very high-speed integrated circuit hardwaredescription language (VHDL) to model synthesizable register-transfer level digital logic. Astandard syntax and semantics for VHDL register-transfer level synthesis is defined. The subset ofthe VHDL language, which is synthesizable, is described, and nonsynthesizable VHDL constructsare identified that should be ignored or flagged as errors.
